txt.en: Now that you have performed your duty for Léofdag, you should satisfy Burnoth's desire that his family know of his continuing health.

'Burnoth and the rest of his Riders still live? You have brought ease to my heart. If my love can survive the wiles of a Wizard, he can survive the growing gloom of Mordor!\n\n'Céolwen and I could use your services, if you would be so kind. Would you bring our love to Burnoth and let him and his Riders know how proud we are of them. We know that they will bring this war to an end....'
Merewen, Burnoth's wife, is standing beside her daughter Céolwen.\n\nYou should speak with Merewen regarding Burnoth's health.
'Do you know my papa? Where is Prancey? My papa is a brave man!'
